Topic.Title: Upload 5.8 source to the Online editor

Posts.EditableText:
Is it possible to upload the 5.8 (download version) porject to the online editor? I was looking for just simply copying code view and paste it to the online editor, so when I am away, I can still work on it, but did not see an option on the online editor version to past source.

Thanks
Posts.HTML:
